articles.description: Ireland's Peter O'Mahony, Conor Murray and Cian Healy will retire from Test rugby at the end of this year's Six Nations.
articles.title: Ireland's Peter O'Mahony, Conor Murray and Cian Healy to retire after Six Nations

articles.description: Manchester United's Andre Onana is in the spotlight as a result of his error against Ipswich - but how does he stack up against the man he replaced, David de Gea?
articles.title: Manchester United: Andre Onana analysis after Ipswich error

articles.description: Michael Vaughan criticises England's persistence with selecting out-and-out fast bowlers following their 2025 Champions Trophy exit.
articles.title: Michael Vaughan criticises England's over-reliance on fast bowlers

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he is "really enjoying" his new Ferrari as he sets the second-fastest time on day two of Formula 1 pre-season testing in Bahrain.
articles.title: F12025 pre-season testing: Lewis Hamilton 'really happy' with new Ferrari

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu will travel to the WTA tournament in Indian Wells after deciding to play following her recent stalking ordeal.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu will play Indian Wells after Dubai stalking incident

articles.description: England head coach Brendon McCullum faces bigger problems than Jos Buttler's future following a frustrating Champions Trophy campaign.
articles.title: England cricket: 'Brendon McCullum's problems go far beyond Jos Buttler's future'

articles.description: With Liverpool taking a 13-point lead at the top of the Premier League table, BBC Sport looks at when they could wrap up the title.
articles.title: When can Liverpool secure the 2024-25 Premier League title?

articles.description: Tom Rowland was a powerhouse England under-18 prop. Eight years later and four stone lighter, he is about to become part of the first sub-85kg New Zealand team.
articles.title: Tom Rowland: Former England under-18 prop on weight-restricted rugby

articles.description: Former England defence coach Felix Jones will become an assistant coach with South Africa from next week.
articles.title: Felix Jones: Former England defence coach joins South Africa staff

articles.description: When England's women face Australia in Las Vegas on Saturday night, they can thank the Great Britain trailblazers who overcame remarkable odds just to get a Test series on - and then won it.
articles.title: England v Australia in Las Vegas: Great Britain Lionesses remember 1996 tour
